short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web extension built for cross-browser bookmark syncing to the cloud.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web extension built for cross-browser bookmark syncing to the cloud. Currently supports Dropbox, Google Drive, and Box as backends for bookmark synchronization.
